first_para: Marcus Charles Jones (born 5 April 1974) is a Conservative Party politician in the UK who has been the Member of Parliament (MP) for Nuneaton since 2010. Previously, he had been Leader of Nuneaton and Bedworth Borough Council.

full.extract: Marcus Charles Jones (born 5 April 1974) is a Conservative Party politician in the UK who has been the Member of Parliament (MP) for Nuneaton since 2010. Previously, he had been Leader of Nuneaton and Bedworth Borough Council.
full.title: Marcus Jones (British politician)
